short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide icons and names to make YouTube chat more visible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome Extension that hides names and icons and makes YouTube chats more visible.

You can also hide superchats, stickers, and member chats, not highlight moderator chats, and anonymize everything.

If you have any problems, please report them here.
https://github.com/noriapi/clean-youtube-chat/issues
